Package org.oddjob.monitor.control

Explorer Controllers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DetailController
    Controller for the detail pane of the monitor.
    NodeControl
    Listens for tree expansion events to lazily create nodes, add listeners only when they are required, and remove listeners when they are not.
    PropertyChangeHelper
    Checks beans to see if they support property change listeners.
    PropertyPolling
    Populate a property model with a subjects properties.
